Package game.match

Class Reader

java.lang.Object
game.match.Reader
public final class Reader
extends java.lang.Object
Reader class represents the class responsible for reading the given card and command file.
Author:
Miguel Carvalho, Filipe Ferraz, Joao Baptista

    • readCardFile

      public static java.util.List<Card> readCardFile​(java.lang.String pathToFile)
      This method reads the content of the card file in order to create a deck.

      pathToFile - Path to the card file
      Returns:
      Deck created from reading the card file

    • readCommandFile

      public static java.util.List<FullCommand> readCommandFile​(java.lang.String pathToFile)
      This method reads the command file in order to create a list with all the commands.
      Parameters:
      pathToFile - Path to the command file
      Returns:
      List of commands read from the command file

    • getCorrespondingCard

      private static Card getCorrespondingCard​(java.lang.String s)
      This method creates the cards present in the card file.
      Parameters:
      s - Each card in String format
      Returns:
      Card corresponding to the input String
